Name: Keep Light
About the game: Bruno is looking for those who left him. He wants know the reason. Will he bring the Light to them or no? The Keep Light is a simple indie game and new masterpiece for connoisseurs of minimalism. You have to solve puzzles and find a way. Classic platformer controls make you ready to play from start. Juicy and atmospheric 3D world put you in a deep mood from beginning to the end of story. Discover two endings depending on your choice. And don't forget to keep light inside :)
